title: maragata shirag-ashaindE
sahitya:
maragata shirag-ashaindE varum mayilE en mannanai kaNDAyO


anupallavi

  viNNavarum pugazh vIran avan vENugAnan marugan vaNNa


caraNam    nidam avan varum vazhi nOkki ninriDinum hitam perum avan ennai ninayAnO
madam azhikkum avan vErin tuNaiyODum viraindu vandu abhayam taruvAnO oLir
